# Import Statements
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import pandas_profiling

import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))
source.941649fa:
# Importing the csv file
prob = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/oob-sm-problems-incidents-links-between-them/problems.csv')
inc = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/oob-sm-problems-incidents-links-between-them/incidents.csv')
screl = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/oob-sm-problems-incidents-links-between-them/PM-IM.csv')

prob.info()
source.df960a50:
# Problem file
fprob = prob[['Код','Название','Описание','Код закрытия','Корневая причина','Обходное решение']]
fprob.columns = ['IdPm','TitlePm','DescriptionPm','ResolutionCodePm','RootcausePm','WorkaroundPm']
fprob.head()
source.28ff47ab:
# Relation file
fscrel = screl[['Источник','Зависимость']]
fscrel.columns = ['IdPm','IdInc']
fscrel.head()
source.c998bbfa:
# Incident file
finc = inc[['Код инцидента','Название','Описание','Кандидат в Управление проблемами','Код закрытия','Решение']]
finc.columns = ['IdInc','TitleInc','DescriptionInc','CandidateInc','ResolutionCodeInc','ResolutionInc']
finc.head()
source.f84b94c7:
# Merge them by relations
df = pd.DataFrame(pd.merge(pd.merge(fprob,fscrel,on='IdPm',how='outer'),finc,on='IdInc',how='outer'))
df.head(10)
